text: Smbat (Armenian: Սմբատ; 1277 – c. 1310) was king of the Armenian Kingdom of Cilicia, ruling from 1296 to 1298. He was the son of Leo III of Armenia and Queen Keran of Armenia. Category:Monarchs of Armenia Category:1270s births Category:1310s deaths Category:13th-century Armenian people
title: Smbat I Hetumian
